definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
acrobatic display (esp. on horseback) (old)/variant of 懈[xie4] and 邂[xie4] (old)
to divide/to break up/to split/to separate/to dissolve/to solve/to melt/to remove/to untie/to loosen/to open/to emancipate/to explain/to understand/to know/a solution/a dissection

sentences.english: Mystified, a satyr wanted to know what he was doing.
sentences.chinese: 一个森林之神大惑不解，他想知道男子在做什么。

sentences.english: It has some venture capitalists scratching their heads.
sentences.chinese: 这让某些风险投资家大惑不解。

definition: to remain puzzled after pondering over sth a hundred times (idiom)/to remain perplexed despite much thought
see 百思不解[bai3 si1 bu4 jie3]
pinyin: bai3 si1 bu4 de2 qi2 jie3

definition: to be surprised/to be amazed/to be stunned
to not understand/to be puzzled by/indissoluble
to be startled/to be shocked/to be amazed
